name: Long Rays Dark Soda Water 275ml
description: Experience the unique blend of flavours in Long Rays Dark Soda Water 275ml, designed specifically to complement and enhance your favourite dark spirits. This premium mixer is a game-changer for enthusiasts of rum, whisky, and barrel-aged gins, offering a sophisticated twist to your traditional drink. Key Features: Type: Craft Mixer Volume: 275ml Ingredients: Ginger, Orange Peel, Smoked Vanilla, Kola Nut Long Rays Dark Soda Water 275ml is not just another mixer; it's a carefully crafted enhancer that brings out the rich, complex flavours of your dark spirits. The zesty orange peel and the warm, spicy ginger kickstart the aroma, leading to a subtle smoky sweetness from the vanilla. This combination is rounded off with the deep, earthy tones of kola nut, creating a balanced, flavourful base perfect for mixing. Whether you're crafting a simple rum and soda or an elaborate cocktail, this mixer adds depth and character to each sip. Transform your home bar with Long Rays Dark Soda Water 275ml. Available now at Barrel & Batch, where you can enjoy hassle-free online ordering and speedy delivery right to your door. Elevate your dark spirit cocktails to a professional level with just a click!

name: Altina Finger Lime Sauvignon Blanc 750ml
description: Altina Finger Lime Sauvignon Blanc 750ml delivers an explosion of crisp, clean flavours sourced from Australia. This unique Sauvignon Blanc is a blend of premium de-alcoholised wine with Native Australian Finger Lime, offering a bright aroma of white nectarine and fresh cucumber. The crisp, lingering finish is underpinned with herbaceous notes, creating a complex and delicious non-alcoholic experience that is perfect for any occasion. Key Features: Grape Variety: Sauvignon Blanc Region: Australia Production Method: De-alcoholised and blended with Native Australian Finger Lime Altina Finger Lime Sauvignon Blanc 750ml gives you a crisp close, underscored by a fresh acidity that makes it an ideal choice for summer evenings.
